name: FarmPunch
description:
Enter the world of farming where only your punch skills matters. Mix of beat-em-up & farming. Your task is to harvest your tomatoes until two of the basket are full, to feed uncle Worm, or...you die...yup) Your high score shows in the end.

W S A D or Arrows - to control the character
SPACEBAR - to interact with the objects

Designed and created : Alexander Ponomariov |  https://twitter.com/SengiGames

Art: Katya Gnativ  | https://www.facebook.com/katya.gnativ

Music : Kreon | https://www.facebook.com/officialkreon
